snippet: United States markets lost their gains on Tuesday after surging during the morning.
abstract: Stocks shed gains following morning surge, as confidence over solid economic news succumbs to news that oil prices had again fallen.
lead_paragraph: United States markets lost their gains on Tuesday after surging during the morning.

headline.main: Markets Lose Ground On an Up-and-Down Day
headline.print_headline: Markets Lose Ground on an Up-and-Down Day
